Title: Requires forfeiture of certain property by certain persons convicted of sexual performance of child offenses
Summary: Permits civil forfeiture action to recover property used in or proceeds derived from criminal activity relating to sexual performances by a child; directs proceeds be used by local social services offices for the prevention and treatment of sexual abuses against children.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil practice law and rules, in relation to forfeiture of the proceeds of a felony related to a sexual performance by a child
